descriptionHtml:
[b]This is my first mod so do expect bugs and stuff not working.[/b]
<br />
<br />[center][/center][b][Requirements][/b]
<br />[url=http://robton.nu/kshairdos/]KS Hairdo's[/url]
<br />[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE (i think)[/url]
<br />
<br />[center][/center][b][Where to find her][/b]
<br />You should be able to find her in the Solitude Stables
<br />(you can teleport there using this command: coc solitudestables
<br />
<br />[center][/center][b]Credit:[/b]
<br />Caliente for her body mod
<br />KS Hairdo's
<br />CPU for his tutorial
<br />
<br />[b][Future updates][/b]
<br />Custom armor
<br />Custom Weapons
<br />Custom Body
<br />and more!
author: Cuiistom
